text: Yahweh’s Servant Brings Salvation
Listen to me, coastlands,
and listen attentively, peoples from far away!
Yahweh called me from \add the\add* womb;
from the ⸤body⸥\f + \fr 49:1 \ft Literally “intestines” \f* of my mother he made my name known.
And he ⸤made⸥\f + \fr 49:2 \ft Literally “put” \f* my mouth like a sharp sword;
he hid me in the shadow of his hand,
and he ⸤made⸥\f + \fr 49:2 \ft Literally “put” \f* me like an sharpened arrow;
he hid me in his quiver.
And he said to me, “You \add are\add* my servant,
Israel, in whom I will show my glory.”
But\f + \fr 49:4 \ft Or “And” \f* I myself said, “I have labored in\f + \fr 49:4 \ft Or “for” \f* vain;
I have used up my strength for nothing and vanity!
Nevertheless, my justice \add is\add* with Yahweh,
and my reward \add is\add* with my God.”
And now Yahweh says,
who formed me from \add the\add* womb as a servant for him,
to bring Jacob back to him,
and that Israel might not\f + \fr 49:5 \ft The reading tradition (\fqa Qere \ft ) has “to him” \f* be gathered,
for\f + \fr 49:5 \ft Or “and” \f* I am honored in the eyes of Yahweh,
and my God has become my strength.
And he says, “It is trivial ⸤for you to be⸥\f + \fr 49:6 \ft Literally “from being you” \f* a servant for me,
to raise up the tribes of Jacob
and to bring back the preserved of Israel.
I will give you as a light \add to the\add* nations,
to be my salvation to the end of the earth.”
Thus says Yahweh, the redeemer of Israel, his holy one,
to the one who despises\f + \fr 49:7 \ft A Dead Sea Scroll reads “is despised \fq with respect to \ft ” \f* life,
to the one who abhors \add the\add* nation,
to \add the\add* slave of rulers:
“Kings shall see and stand up;
princes, and they shall bow down,
for the sake of Yahweh, who \add is\add* faithful,
the holy one of Israel, and he has chosen you.”
Yahweh Restores the Afflicted
Thus says Yahweh:
“I have answered you in a time of favor,
and helped you on a day of salvation,
and watched over you,
and given you as a covenant of \add the\add* people,
to raise up \add the\add* land,
to give \add the\add* desolate hereditary property as an inheritance,
saying to the ⸤prisoners⸥,\f + \fr 49:9 \ft Literally “captured ones” \f* “Come out!”
to those who \add are\add* in darkness, “Show yourselves!”
they shall feed ⸤along⸥\f + \fr 49:9 \ft Literally “on” \f* \add the\add* ways,
and their pasturage \add shall be\add* on all \add the\add* barren heights.
They shall not be hungry or thirsty,
and heat and sun shall not strike them,
for he who takes pity on them will lead them,
and he will guide them to springs of water.
And I will ⸤make⸥\f + \fr 49:11 \ft Literally “put” \f* all my mountains like a road,
and my highways shall lead up.\f + \fr 49:11 \ft Or “be high” \f*
Look! These shall come from afar,
And look! These from \add the\add* north and from \add the\add* west
and these from the land of Sinim.”
Sing for joy, heavens, and rejoice, earth!
Mountains must break forth \add in\add* rejoicing!
For Yahweh has comforted his people,
and he will take pity on his afflicted ones.
Yahweh Remembers Zion
But\f + \fr 49:14 \ft Or “And” \f* Zion said, “Yahweh has forsaken me,
and the Lord has forgotten me!”
Can a woman forget her suckling,
\add refrain\add* from having compassion on the child of her womb?
Indeed, these may forget,
but\f + \fr 49:15 \ft Or “and” \f* I, I will not forget you!
Look, I have inscribed you on the palms of \add my\add* hands;
your walls \add are\add* continually before me.
Your children hasten;
your destroyers and those who laid you waste depart\f + \fr 49:17 \ft Or “move away” \f* from you.
Lift your eyes up all around and see;
all of them gather; they come to you.
⸤As surely as I live⸥,\f + \fr 49:18 \ft Literally “Life I” \f*
⸤declares⸥\f + \fr 49:18 \ft Literally “declaration of” \f* Yahweh,
surely you shall put on all of them like \add an\add* ornament,
and you shall bind them on like \add a\add* bride.
Surely your sites of ruins and desolate \add places\add* and land of ruins,\f + \fr 49:19 \ft Hebrew “ruin” \f*
surely now you will be ⸤too cramped for your⸥\f + \fr 49:19 \ft Literally “cramped by” \f* inhabitants,\f + \fr 49:19 \ft Hebrew “inhabitant” \f*
and those who engulfed you will be far away.
Yet the children ⸤born when you were bereaved⸥\f + \fr 49:20 \ft Literally “of your bereavement” \f* will say in your ⸤hearing⸥,\f + \fr 49:20 \ft Literally “ears” \f*
“The place is \add too\add* cramped for me;
⸤make room⸥\f + \fr 49:20 \ft Literally “approach” \f* for me so that I can dwell.”
Then\f + \fr 49:21 \ft Or “And” \f* you will say in your heart,
“Who has borne me these?”
And, “I \add was\add* bereaved and barren,
exiled and thrust away;
so\f + \fr 49:21 \ft Or “and” \f* who raised these?
Look at me! I was left alone;
⸤where have these come from⸥?”\f + \fr 49:21 \ft Literally “these where they” \f*
Thus says the Lord Yahweh:
“Look! I will lift my hand up to \add the\add* nations,
and I will raise my signal to \add the\add* peoples,
and they shall bring your sons in \add their\add* bosom,
and your daughters shall be carried on \add their\add* shoulders.\f + \fr 49:22 \ft Hebrew “shoulder” \f*
And kings shall be your ⸤guardians⸥,\f + \fr 49:23 \ft Literally “those who nurture” \f*
and their queens your nurses.
They shall bow down, ⸤faces⸥\f + \fr 49:23 \ft Literally “noses” \f* \add to the\add* ground, to you,
and they will lick up the dust of your feet.
Then\f + \fr 49:23 \ft Or “And” \f* you will know that I \add am\add* Yahweh;
those who await me shall not be ashamed.
Can war-booty be taken from \add the\add* mighty?
or can a captive of a righteous\f + \fr 49:24 \ft The Dead Sea Scroll has “violent” \f* \add person\add* be rescued?
But thus says Yahweh:
“Indeed a captive of \add the\add* mighty shall be taken,
and \add the\add* war-booty \add of\add* \add the\add* tyrant shall be rescued,
for\f + \fr 49:25 \ft Or “and” \f* I myself will dispute \add with\add* your opponent,
and I myself will save your children.
And I will feed your oppressors their \add own\add* flesh,
and they shall be drunk \add with\add* their blood as \add with\add* wine.
Then\f + \fr 49:26 \ft Or “And” \f* all flesh shall know that I \add am\add* Yahweh,
your savior and redeemer, the strong \add one\add* of Jacob.”
